ygData.subject: Re: Fletching
ygData.msgSnippet: Verant has not changed anything in regards to fletching supplies in the evil lands.  You still cannot buy ALL of the components you need in Neriak, Oggok or
ygData.messageBody:
Verant has not changed anything in regards to fletching supplies in the
"evil" lands. You still cannot buy ALL of the components you need in
Neriak, Oggok or Grobb. You will have to either develop contacts who can go
into town to buy you what you need or you sit around with a wasted skill.
There is supposedly a centaur merchant, who tolerates Teir'Dal, in a centaur
village in the Karanas. I would not venture there until you are around 15th
Level or have a strong party to travel with.

There is also a shop outside of Oggok that sells bowyering components but I
have yet to locate it. I have a friend who dumped 20 training points into
fletching and decided to forego crafting arrows altogether and went straight
to bows. It is expensive but it is all we can realistically do for now. My
suggestion is, if you have your heart set on being a fletching SK, you
select a human to play as so you have access to the components (provided the
human merchants even sell to you)...

Drakhan
Shadowknight of the 15th Order
Servant and Son to The Father, Innoruuk
Solusek Ro server


----- Original Message -----
From: Eric Muringer <muringer@...>
To: <eq_shadowknights@onelist.com>
Sent: Sunday, June 06, 1999 4:29 AM
Subject: [eq_shadowknights] Fletching


> From: "Eric Muringer" <muringer@...>
>
> Ok, way back I knew there was a big stink because it seemed no evil race
> could fletch. I was wondering if by any chance this has been changed? I am
> making a DE SK and I REALLY want to take up archery with him. Archery for
me
> is one of the main reasons I am choosing SK's. Can someone please please
> please please tell me that verant fixed this oversight and there is now a
> place to buy fletching materials? I logged on and checked that one place
in
> neriak and that place is a joke; it only sells nocks.
>
> So is it possible to buy materials not in Kelethin or surefall? Does
maybe
> Grobb or Oggok have the rest pf the materials? And if it isnt possible
maybe
> all SK's should feedback this as it essentially makes one of our skills
> useless.
>
> Thanks.
>
>
